sentence: We asked our butler for eucalyptus aromatherapy once and each day and night the aroma was refreshed in our room
Rooms and rest of amenities were updated and very clean

Now that we have been back here for the 5th time Where to begin from the magical experience of entering the hotel and pulling up to the main entrance with a butler opening your door and welcoming you to the resort with ice cold towels to refresh yourselves from your travels
Great Service Building Needs Remodeling
I will update after our trip in September
The entire Caribbean is experiencing huge amounts of dead seaweed washing ashore but the maintenance people at Le Blanc worked tirelessly to remove it and keep the beach groomed to perfection
Rooms were nice but need updating
The property was very clean but the hotel physical plant seems to be in need of a major renovation the pools the decking the gym are well maintained but wear and tear shows
There are extraordinary places in the world where body mind and spirit is renewed restored and researched

The registration process was quick and easy with the royal treatment starting upon arrival with a cold wet towel to refresh ourselves after the trip followed by a thirst quenching coconut water beverage

Roger at the Concierge and Juan Carlos the limo driver deserve a special call out for their high level of service and profesionalismSome of the furnishings in the common area and the rooms are a bit tired however we understand that Le Blanc will be closed in a few months for a four month renovation which I am sure will address these items
for a hotel resort it is an excelent place does need a bit of refurbishment but if you like the city night life this is the place for you
We look forward to returning after the remodel
Although the resort is a bit dated they are reportedly shutting down this summer for renovations the service is fantastic
We stayed at Le Blanc Spa Resort after the renovation period for five nights at the end of December
Last year they remodeled and closed for 6 months so we were excited to see the changes
He also told us that during the 6 month remodel they assigned them to work at other properties so that they would not lose income
The renovations were noticeable with a multi jet shower that was hard to leave
There have been wonderful improvements to the food and the physical renovations to the property have only enhanced and beautified and already stellar property
Five years ago we did the vow renewal on the beach at LeBlanc and it was complimentary
They updated some of the rooms to add Presidential suites
We are returning home from an 8 day vacation at the totally remodeled resort
Yes they still could write novels on how to be treat a customer but now after major renovation the facilities are even more spectacular than before
If you want a holiday to refresh and rejuvenate you le Blanc is the place
Other than check in at no time did anyone besides the floor butlers check on us make sure we were completely satisfied or provide any updates on where we were supposed to be
